## LiteralUnion type

Represents a union of a literal type and a base type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type LiteralUnion<LiteralType, BaseType extends Primitive.Type = string> = LiteralType | (BaseType & Record<never, never>);
```
**References:** [Primitive.Type](./toolkit.primitive.type.md)

## Example


```ts
type A = LiteralUnion<"a" | "b", string>; // "a" | "b" | string
```
